title: Elysee
content:
Hello, everybody. Well, after many years just watching what goes on in the wonderworld of type, i'm finally here participating. I have tens of old and new sketches but as my commercial site is up and running now i guess i'm going to get my gears running and work on all of those!   
I'm planning a may release of this font, which is fully sketched but i wanted an opinion on the look ¿is it atractive and/or useful? This is one of my favourites but i'm not sure about that name...   
 ![probably elysee](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154648im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/855.gif)  
   
Greetings to you all from Mexico City and by the way you can check out my new site at [www.roxyfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416154648/http:/www.roxyfonts.com/)
author: victoryb

comments.content:
It has potential. I especially like your 's'. Could you post the whole set of characters?   
  
   
Sbo
